column4: has anybody else gotten feisty to work with an ATI card and direct rendering?
I have a 9600 and i keep getting an error message "PreInitDAL failed"
somehow I got 2d working... I have no idea.. but i don't have direct rendering, and it's running OpenGL: Tungsten Graphics
Have you tried the restricted driver manager?
Yeah, it seems like whenever i run the restricted driver mananger, it puts me back into a no video situation
I've had the most success so far with the proprietary driver from ATI
How did you install the ATi drivers in Edgy?
hmm... It was a while ago... But I think I used the xorg-driver-fglrx package from the repository... I'm pretty sure i added the restricted repository to my sources
That all looks fine, did you ever install the Drivers from ATi.com/
Yeah, as an alternative I followed a guide to install the ati-driver-installer-8.36.5-x86.x86_64.run package from ATI
this is the guide i followed, method 2: http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Feisty_Installation_Guide
What you did then may be interfering with the drivers from the repos.
Follow the uninstall instructions then try the repo drivers again
Alright I'll work on it... I'm about go go buy an nvidia card :) Thanks for your help. I might be back.
Hey, thanks again for the help. I finally got everything working through restricted-drivers. It turns out I had my xorg.con videoram set really low and it was causing some bizzare problems. Cheers!
